item.title: DOMINION ENERGY INC 10-K
item.description: DOMINION ENERGY INC, which is in the Electric Services [4911] industry, SEC 10-K filing on February 21, 2023 had 82501 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: energy - 1660 instances dominion - 1506 instances million - 1059 instances virginia - 975 instances 2022 - 823 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here.
